feed.title: Sink Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.5
entry.content:
What's Fixed

  • link list is always loading https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/issues/89

What's Changed

  • add chrome extension for the sink by @zhuzhuyule in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/45
  • feat: remove leading and trailing slash from slug by @manuelosorio in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/54
  • feat: add Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct by @ccbikai in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/60
  • feat: Extract the fixed link name into the configuration. by @citynight in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/59
  • doc(Deployment): Update guides for how to deploy. by @ZL-Asica in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/80
  • Standardize .node-version format for compatibility by @ZL-Asica in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/81
  • Add the sink shortcuts by @fatwang2 in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/87

New Contributors

  • @zhuzhuyule made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/45
  • @manuelosorio made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/54
  • @ccbikai made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/60
  • @citynight made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/59
  • @ZL-Asica made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/80
  • @fatwang2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/87

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.4...v0.1.5

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add case sensitivity configuration for slugs by @ZL-Asica in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/88

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.5...v0.1.6

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add local search functionality
  • feat: Statistical number increase animation
  • fix: Login expiration leading to infinite interface calls issue

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.6...v0.1.7

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: rewrite case-sensitive logic
  • chore: Upgrade dependency packages to the latest versions

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.7...v0.1.8

entry.title: New release for Sink: v0.1.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Slug filter to the analysis page.
  • Fix duplicates on edit by @7heMech in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/105
  • docs: update KV Namespace setting path & add docs URL by @dpi0 in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/108

New Contributors

  • @7heMech made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/105
  • @dpi0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/pull/108

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ccbikai/Sink/compare/v0.1.8...v0.1.9
